course.title: The Complete 2021 Web Development Bootcamp
course.subtitle: Become a full-stack web developer with just one course. HTML, CSS, Javascript, Node, React, MongoDB and more!

reviews.body: It was an amazing experience learning new stuffs in this course as a beginner. Angela makes hard concepts look pretty easy to grasp. I truly loved the way she taught each topic. Thank you so much for all the hard work you put in to make this course.
Very comprehensive course, you'll learn a lot of things. The React module is very interesting but need just the last step, integrate back-end in React App.

This course is one of the best for everyone (beginners, intermediates, advance ), Dr.Angela is a good tutor. This course is well designed, taught and explained. I don't have any idea about coding but this course enlightened me. I have also purchased the ios 13 and swift 5, and the complete 2020 flutter development Bootcamp. Just to tell you how much I enjoyed the way she teaches, explains and solves problems/challenges.

This was an amazing course! I can't say enough good things about this course. Angela is an amazing instructor, and did an extremely great job teaching all that was promised in the course description.

I'm happy "The Complete 2020 Web Development Bootcamp" was my FIRST programming course! I feel confident enough to move onto more specific courses. Thank you Angela!!!!

This was an excellent course. The best part was all the different challenges that get you to really think about the problem and try your own solution before heading for Angela's answer.

The course is well structured and has been specifically designed to actually teach specific web technologies, rather than just copy code.

Well done Angela.

Paul

Great Course, Angela is a wonderful instructor!

The course covers a lot of subjects and most of the videos are up to date and well explained:)

"I got a magic stick from an angel now I think I am ready to use". The magic stick is "The Complete 2020 Web Development Bootcamp" and the angel is "Dr. Angela Yu". You are one of the best teachers in my life, Thank you.

I just finished this course yay! it was a crazy adventure, it was not easy for me to create a time to study with a 2-year-old hyper baby! But I did it!!! Thank you so much, Angela, loved the way how you teach. Wish you the best and keep going!!

Thank you Angela Yu! I finally finished the course and have a clear grasp on things. A lot of things you’ve mentioned really resonate with the teachings in Christianity especially the discipline and not dwell on what others have to say. We often judge ourselves and others so much we forget who we are, in reality we are nobody and in my Christian faith which I’ve found 2 years ago after perineal bad experiences, if we stop judging and playing God, all we have left is Love. With faith and understanding we can accomplish all things. Let’s stay out of our heads and into seeking and learning, with understanding we will prevail.

Loved this course, this was my gateway to the world of Web Development. Thank you Angela for being such an amazing Instructor. Would love to see more advanced concepts in JS and React in your future courses. Then again, I will not wait since I don't want to be stuck in tutorial hell. Time to build my own web apps. Thank you soo much.

Curso muito bom, além de entregar um conteúdo didático e atual, tive um overview de quase todas as áreas da web. Esse curso foi essencial para que poucos meses depois conseguisse o meu trabalho atual.

it has to be (if not the best) one of the best ways to start your web development journey! I learned so many things during this course

kudos to Angela and the App Brewery team :)

instructor.name: Dr. Angela Yu
instructor.briefIntroduction:
I'm Angela, I'm a developer with a passion for teaching. I'm the lead instructor at the London App Brewery, London's leading Programming Bootcamp. I've helped hundreds of thousands of students learn to code and change their lives by becoming a developer. I've been invited by companies such as Twitter, Facebook and Google to teach their employees.

My first foray into programming was when I was just 12 years old, wanting to build my own Space Invader game. Since then, I've made hundred of websites, apps and games. But most importantly, I realised that my greatest passion is teaching.

I spend most of my time researching how to make learning to code fun and make hard concepts easy to understand. I apply everything I discover into my bootcamp courses. In my courses, you'll find lots of geeky humour but also lots of explanations and animations to make sure everything is easy to understand.

I'll be there for you every step of the way.
